description: This header file defines a template class 'MockAccessor' used to manage pointers to mock objects, including static methods to set and get the internal pointer. It appears to be used for mocking in tests, providing a standardized interface for setting and retrieving mock implementations.

classes.name: MockAccessor
classes.description: A template class providing static methods to manage mock object pointers, enabling setup and retrieval of mocks in testing scenarios.

methods.name: setPtr
methods.description: Sets the internal static pointer to a mock object.

methods.name: getPtr
methods.description: Retrieves the internal static pointer to a mock object.
